reviews.review: Awesome game. Would recommend the second one more, though. Either way, if you have some money to spare, it's worth the buy.

Portal was a revolutionary game when it first arrived in 2008, and continues to amaze fans for almost a decade. The level         design is great. my only complaint is that players (espescially newer ones) will get confused with some of the physics. I rate 9.4 out of 10

Portal 1, un capolavoro nel suo genere. 
Un rompicampo con una sobria e coinvolgente trama in cui ci si diverte a giocare con una pistola che genera portali e, se pur limitatamente, si sente la possibilità di viaggiare attraverso lo spazio e di giocare con le leggi della fisica.
I livelli non sono troppo difficili eppure si gioisce per ogni successo e spesso, immersi in questa bella storia che viene narrata da un dolce suono da sfondo a un attento narratore.

In sintesi:
PRO
-Meccaniche di gioco
-Divertimento attraverso i portali

CONTRO
-Pochi livelli

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the first and possibly last time that a video game has just blown my mind. It's one of those cases where you feel like child asking: "Wait! How did they do that?". This game, like everyone else agrees, is a definite must have in your Steam library. Just remember, there is more to the game than just the puzzle...

Excellent puzzle game using a really cool and unique game mechanic - make portals that connect two distint locations in 3D space and use them to solve puzzles. This game really tests your spatial awareness. The bonus maps and challenges are great for those who want an extra challenge.  Very charming narrative, captivating atmosphere, plenty of easter eggs, the game has great replay value as well. Recommend to anyone.

What can I say, Valve knows how to make a game.

Portal is a puzzle game, but it also portrays a lone character trapped in a vast underground facility, forced to do the bidding of a malicious AI. The claustrophobic atmosphere and depressing tunes carry weight as you find a way to escape.

One of the best games ever made. 10/10

Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei. 

19 câmaras de teste pra você quebrar a cabeça, mais um plot twist no final. Se você gosta de puzzles e aventura, é diversão garantida.

Would recommend to anyone who hasn't experienced Portal yet. A great game, 10/10.

This little game made a storm when it was released as a part of The Orange Box, and for a reason. The narrative, the puzzles, the soundtrack - all of them are brilliant and make quite an experience. So why take some rando's opinion if you can see the Aperture Science test chambers for yourself? Trust me, it's well worth it.
Theres nothing to be said that hasnt been already.  Another great game from valve.  Buy it.

First off, I like this game because it doesn't throw the story in your face. In Portal 2, you're constantly being reminded that there is a story, unlike Portal, which lets you find a story yourself. This also happens in Half-Life. The game doesn't throw the story all at you in one giant mess, the story is very organized and layed out for you to discover it yourself. I highly recommend this game to anybody who wants to have a good time playing a game.
Definitely an enjoyable experience :D
One of the best physics puzzle games. Apature science is working for the betterment of  all mankind.

[h1]¿Realmente afecta su duración?[/h1]
Hace tiempo Portal me atrajo por ser un juego de puzzles y principalmente también, obvio, por la mecánica del juego (Los portales). Si la forma de resolver las cámaras te atrajo, entonces todo el juego en general es para ti, porque te hace usar portales todo el tiempo. [spoiler]Incluso cuando te escapas de las cámaras de pruebas para ir en busca de GLaDOS.[/spoiler]
Con respecto a su duración, como dice el título, es algo corta, no tanto pero sí se nota, pero eso se logra recompensar con lo inovador que es el juego, los puzzles, chistes de GLaDos, su historia, que al final incluso puede que lo quieras jugar otra vez todo completo por ser corto.

10/10

Awesome game if you like puzzles, the only bad thing is that it is short; I finished it in one sitting. If you don't mind missing some story, go play portal 2 instead.

Ich finde Portal schön gemacht, die Rätsel sind gut durchdacht, ich mochte gladios Kommentare und die Idee mit der Portal Gun fand ich interessant. 

Aber ich finde, dass Portal zu kurz ist. Denn ich habe knapp 3,3 Stunden gebraucht für die Story und habe mich an einigen Stellen schon blöd angestellt.

Fazit: Es ist ein schönes Spiel für zwischendurch aber nicht für mehrere Stunden am Stück.

Un juego excelente de puzzles.

Los puzzles se resuelven mediante portales y otros elementos que tendremos en cada nivel. No son muy difíciles, pero algunos nos darán trabajo.

Su punto fuerte es, digamoslo así, la átmosfera:
-El personaje de GLaDOS, quien nos hablará todo el tiempo, está muy bien trabajado.
-A simple vista, la historia es simple, somos una sujeto de pruebas que tiene que superar diferentes cámaras, para así, que te evalúen; pero tiene muchos detalles visuales que te hacen darte cuenta de ciertas cosas sobre esta.

Un juego que debes jugar, muy recomendado. Y recuerda, the cake is a lie.
Short but beautiful game!!
The Cake is a lie.

One of the best puzzle game, if not the best inovation in puzzle games ever.
The learning curve was perfect for me, harder and harder, step by step, never too easy, never too hard. Like any puzzle game, I got stuck a few times but never too long. It's also nice to play, as it's not only about thinking, but also about trying.

I did like a bit less when there was some harder agility requirements, especially at the end. I would have prefered harder to solve puzzles. It's still 90% about thinking and 10% about jumping right.

Ambiance is done right ! I won't spoil too much, as part of the fun is to know who you are...

Game length is a bit short, not too short for being a disapointment.

My ranking: Worth buying and playing if you like puzzle, at any price under 11$ (2016).

This game is super well done! It sets up an atmosphere that compliments the characters and gameplay well. Portal is not a SUPER easy game, in fact it's hard enough to possibly stump you for a little while, but it's not nearly hard enough to make it unsolvable. Overall, if you have the money and some time, then you might DEFINITELY want to pick this game up.

(Also this shows up in the orange box for $5 and gets bundled with other great games!)
Edit: (It's probably even less now)
